alert.note: Alert for Peoria; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 10:04AM CDT until further notice by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Peoria affecting Peoria, Woodford and Tazewell Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Peoria. * WHEN...From Sunday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Some flooding begins to bottomland not protected by levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning and continue rising to a crest of 19.0 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Illinois River Peoria 18.0 14.8 Thu 9 am CDT 15.0 16.3 18.2 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
